languages.text: "Так тому и быть. Наше краткое знакомство будет упомянуто в саге, повествующей о моем побеге из Комморры. Гордись этим!" {n}Громогласно расхохотавшись, рыжеволосый отворачивается.{/n}
"So be it. Our brief acquaintance will be mentioned in the saga recounting my escape from Commorragh. Take pride in that!" {n}With a booming laugh, the red-haired Space Wolf turns away.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Так тому и быть. Наше краткое знакомство будет упомянуто в саге, повествующей о моем побеге из Комморры. Гордись этим!" {n}Громогласно расхохотавшись, рыжеволосый отворачивается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "So be it. Our brief acquaintance will be mentioned in the saga recounting my escape from Commorragh. Take pride in that!" {n}With a booming laugh, the red-haired Space Wolf turns away.{/n}

"So be it. Our brief acquaintance will be mentioned in the saga recounting my escape from Commorragh. Take pride in that!" {n}With a booming laugh, the red-haired Space Wolf turns away.{/n}

languages.text: “那就这样吧。我逃出科摩罗的旅途将会被写成史诗，其中也会提到我们的短暂相识。这值得让你感到自豪！”{n}红发的太空野狼发出了震耳欲聋的大笑，转身离开了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "So be it. Our brief acquaintance will be mentioned in the saga recounting my escape from Commorragh. Take pride in that!" {n}With a booming laugh, the red-haired Space Wolf turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “那就这样吧。我逃出科摩罗的旅途将会被写成史诗，其中也会提到我们的短暂相识。这值得让你感到自豪！”{n}红发的太空野狼发出了震耳欲聋的大笑，转身离开了。{/n}

languages.text: «Que así sea. Nuestra breve asociación se mencionará en la saga que narre mi huida de Commorragh. ¡Puede estar orgullos{mf|o|a} de eso!». {n}Con una sonora risotada, el pelirrojo Lobo Espacial se aleja.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So be it. Our brief acquaintance will be mentioned in the saga recounting my escape from Commorragh. Take pride in that!" {n}With a booming laugh, the red-haired Space Wolf turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Que así sea. Nuestra breve asociación se mencionará en la saga que narre mi huida de Commorragh. ¡Puede estar orgullos{mf|o|a} de eso!». {n}Con una sonora risotada, el pelirrojo Lobo Espacial se aleja.{/n}

languages.text: 「そうだろう。俺たちの短い付き合いは、俺がコモラフから脱出したときのサーガに語られるだろう。それを誇りに思え！」{n}赤毛のスペースウルフは豪快に笑い、背を向けた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "So be it. Our brief acquaintance will be mentioned in the saga recounting my escape from Commorragh. Take pride in that!" {n}With a booming laugh, the red-haired Space Wolf turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そうだろう。俺たちの短い付き合いは、俺がコモラフから脱出したときのサーガに語られるだろう。それを誇りに思え！」{n}赤毛のスペースウルフは豪快に笑い、背を向けた。{/n}

languages.text: "So sei es. Unsere kurze Bekanntschaft wird in der Saga über meine Flucht von Commorragh Erwähnung finden. Seid stolz darauf!" {n}Mit einem dröhnenden Lachen wendet der rothaarige Space Wolf sich ab.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So be it. Our brief acquaintance will be mentioned in the saga recounting my escape from Commorragh. Take pride in that!" {n}With a booming laugh, the red-haired Space Wolf turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "So sei es. Unsere kurze Bekanntschaft wird in der Saga über meine Flucht von Commorragh Erwähnung finden. Seid stolz darauf!" {n}Mit einem dröhnenden Lachen wendet der rothaarige Space Wolf sich ab.{/n}

languages.text: « Ainsi soit-il. Notre brève rencontre sera contée dans la saga qui retracera mon évasion de Commorragh. Soyez-en {mf|fier|fière} ! » {n}Avec un rire tonitruant, le Space Wolf aux cheveux roux se détourne de vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So be it. Our brief acquaintance will be mentioned in the saga recounting my escape from Commorragh. Take pride in that!" {n}With a booming laugh, the red-haired Space Wolf turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ainsi soit-il. Notre brève rencontre sera contée dans la saga qui retracera mon évasion de Commorragh. Soyez-en {mf|fier|fière} ! » {n}Avec un rire tonitruant, le Space Wolf aux cheveux roux se détourne de vous.{/n}

languages.original_text: "So be it. Our brief acquaintance will be mentioned in the saga recounting my escape from Commorragh. Take pride in that!" {n}With a booming laugh, the red-haired Space Wolf turns away.{/n}

languages.text: "Öyle olsun. Kısa süren tanışıklığımız, Commorragh'tan kaçışımı anlatan destanda yer bulacak. Bununla gurur duyabilirsin!" {n}Kızıl saçlı Uzay Kurdu, gürleyen bir kahkahayla uzaklaşıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So be it. Our brief acquaintance will be mentioned in the saga recounting my escape from Commorragh. Take pride in that!" {n}With a booming laugh, the red-haired Space Wolf turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Öyle olsun. Kısa süren tanışıklığımız, Commorragh'tan kaçışımı anlatan destanda geçecek. Bununla gurur duyabilirsin!" {n}Kızıl saçlı Uzay Kurdu, gürleyen bir kahkahayla uzaklaşıyor.{/n}
